ygData.subject: Vlad of the Wolves
ygData.msgSnippet: The Khan opened his eyes... Only to see that what he felt as his arm was actually his mech s weapon pod. His whole body had become the mech. He did not react.

The Khan opened his eyes...
Only to see that what he felt as his arm was actually his mech's 
weapon pod. His whole body had become the mech.
He did not react. He simply stared at himself. He did not realize his 
state.

Vlad: It is a pity. I am dead and Phelan is not the cause of my 
demise...

He heard the howling of a wolf pack in his back. He turned and zoomed 
his vision, then changed it to infrared, revealing a dozen of 
silhouettes in the night.

Vlad: Then again...

He looked at them. They were smaller than the wolves that lived on the 
various clan worlds, but that mattered little to him. He wanted to 
look more friendly to them, to befriend them...
His cylindrical cockpit came down, giving the impression of a chest, 
and a human looking head came out. Handsome looking, the warrior would 
have been attractive if not for for the long scar that ran on the left 
side of his face. The weapon pods both became side-weapons as humanoid 
arms took their place. He left both guns in place, as the pack leader 
came from under the trees.
The Khan slowly held his hand out, waiting for the beast to smell it.
It did so, then howled, first alone, then followed by the whole pack.
He then ran, giving the start to a new hunt. Vlad felt he had to 
follow them, but first he looked to the skies.

Vlad: Where there are wolves, there are man...

He fired a volley of the now smallish missiles, dotting the night with 
light bursts. They would know his position. He ran to catch up with 
the pack. That would keep him to an edge for some times...
